course_description: How do we understand the events that recently erupted with different degrees of violence in North African and Middle Eastern countries? Why were experts including diplomats, pundits, and politicians taken by surprise? How do media outlets like CNN, BBC, and Al Jazeera cover this "social uprising"?
sections: Class Nbr: 4510, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 5:30-6:45p, Instructor: S. Cherribi, Status: Open
